name: RememBear
description:
RememBear is fast paced a memory game in which you must protect the picnicking children from having their picnic ruined by bears. Quickly remember the location of the approaching bears, and then carefully deploy your platoon of park rangers to catch them! After each round, any remaining bears will move closer towards the centre of the screen… don't let them reach the picnic, and make sure all your rangers come home safely!

The game has been beautifully illustrated by Faye Simms @MD_Doodles


Please note the flash version of the game runs at 320x480 resolution.
